Symbol.Script_3D:
if GLOB_STRUCTURE_DISPLAY=0 then skr1="" skr2="" endif if GLOB_STRUCTURE_DISPLAY=1 then skr1="Отделка" skr2="Другая" endif if GLOB_STRUCTURE_DISPLAY=2 then skr1="Отделка" skr2="" endif del top group "pol" rotz -SYMB_ROTANGLE for i=1 to k_otr_pl put otr_pl[i][1],otr_pl[i][2] hotspot otr_pl[i][1],otr_pl[i][2],0,i hotspot otr_pl[i][1],otr_pl[i][2],h_pirog,unID:unID=unID+1 hotline otr_pl[i][1],otr_pl[i][2],0,otr_pl[i][3],otr_pl[i][4],0,unID:unID=unID+1 hotline otr_pl[i][1],otr_pl[i][2],h_pirog,otr_pl[i][3],otr_pl[i][4],h_pirog,unID:unID=unID+1 next i for i=n_sloi to 1 step -1 if pokaz[i]<>skr1 and pokaz[i]<>skr2 then LINE_PROPERTY 2 pen gs_cont_pen SECT_ATTRS sloi_n[i][1],gs_back_pen,gs_fill_pen,p_razd material mat[i] if i>1 then PRISM NSP/2,sloi_n[i][2]/100,USE(NSP) if i=1 then PRISM NSP/2,sloi_n[i][2]/100,GET(NSP) endif addz sloi_n[i][2]/100 next i endgroup del top group "operator" rotz -SYMB_ROTANGLE if k_otv>=1 then for i = 1 to k_otv if i = 1 then n_perv = 1 if i > 1 then n_perv=k_otr_otv[k_otv-1]+1 for j=1 to k_otr_otv[i]-1 put otr_otv[n_perv+j][1],otr_otv[n_perv+j][2] put otr_otv[n_perv+j][3],otr_otv[n_perv+j][4] hotspot otr_otv[n_perv+j][1],otr_otv[n_perv+j][2],0,i hotspot otr_otv[n_perv+j][1],otr_otv[n_perv+j][2],h_pirog,unID:unID=unID+1 hotline otr_otv[n_perv+j][1],otr_otv[n_perv+j][2],0,otr_otv[n_perv+j][3],otr_otv[n_perv+j][4],0,unID:unID=unID+1 hotline otr_otv[n_perv+j][1],otr_otv[n_perv+j][2],0,otr_otv[n_perv+j][3],otr_otv[n_perv+j][4],h_pirog,unID:unID=unID+1 next j PRISM NSP/2,h_pirog,GET(NSP) next i endif endgroup result_1=SUBGROUP("pol","operator")
PLACEGROUP result_1
KILLGROUP "pol" KILLGROUP "operator" KILLGROUP result_1
Symbol.Script_2D:
otobr = 0 if annot[1] = 0 then otobr = 1 else for i=1 to vardim1(annot) if annot[i] = GLOB_SCALE then otobr = 1 next i endif unID=1 show_pol = 0 : show_pot = 0 : show_type_pot = 0 if tip_el = "Пол" then success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-as", "show_pol", show_pol) if otobr and not(show_pol) then otobr = 0 else success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-as", "show_pot", show_pot) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-as", "show_type_pot", show_type_pot) if show_pot and not(show_pot) then otobr = 0 endif
if otobr then pen gs_cont_pen LINE_TYPE connt DEFINE STYLE "MARK" Shrift, Shrift_razm, 2, Shrift_tip STYLE "MARK" if tip_el = "Пол" then for i=1 to k_otr_pl hotspot2 otr_pl[i][1],otr_pl[i][2], unID unID=unID+1 hotline2 otr_pl[i][1],otr_pl[i][2],otr_pl[i][3],otr_pl[i][4] ! line2 otr_pl[i][1],otr_pl[i][2],otr_pl[i][3],otr_pl[i][4] ! put otr_pl[i][1],otr_pl[i][2],1+32 next i LINE_TYPE 1 HOTSPOT2 pos_x1, 0, unID, pos_y1, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_x1, pos_y1, unID, pos_y1, 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_x1, -1, unID, pos_y1, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, pos_y1, unID, pos_x1, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_x1, pos_y1, unID, pos_x1, 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, pos_y1, unID, pos_x1, 3: unID=unID+1
add2 pos_x1,pos_y1
mashtab = GLOB_SCALE / 100 MUL2 mashtab,mashtab k = 0.8 MUL2 k,k DRAWINDEX 0 if debug = 0 then text2 0.5,0.87/2,tip_pol if debug = 1 then text2 0.5,0.87/2,n_zon DRAWINDEX 20 set fill f poly2 3,1+2+4, 0,0, 1,0, 0.5,0.87 hotspot2 0.5,0.87/2,unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot2 0.5,0.87,unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot2 0,0,unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot2 1,0,unID : unID=unID+1 else ch = INITADDONSCOPE ("PolyOperations", "", "") PREPAREFUNCTION ch, "CreateContainer", "mySourceContainer", "" PREPAREFUNCTION ch, "CreateContainer", "myDestinationContainer", "" PREPAREFUNCTION ch, "SetSourceContainer", "mySourceContainer", "" PREPAREFUNCTION ch, "SetDestinationContainer", "myDestinationContainer", "" nVertices = k_otr_pl nContours = 1 dim vertArray[][] dim contourArray[] for i=1 to k_otr_pl vertArray[i][1] = otr_pl[i][1] vertArray[i][2] = otr_pl[i][2] vertArray[i][3] = 0 next i contourArray[1] = k_otr_pl+1 PREPAREFUNCTION ch, "Store", "poly1", nVertices, nContours, vertArray, contourArray itemIdx=1 PREPAREFUNCTION ch, "OffsetParams", "", itemIdx, offset_l dim resPolyIDArray[] numPoly = CALLFUNCTION (ch, "ResizeContour", "poly1", resPolyIDArray) polygonID = resPolyIDArray[1] gosub 100 ! Get one polygon contour data (without contours) if nsp > 0 then poly2_ nsp/3, 1+4, use(nsp) for i = 1 to nsp step 3 hotspot2 get(2) get(1) next i else pen 20 text2 0,0,"!!ERROR!!" endif CLOSEADDONSCOPE (ch) aaz = SYMB_POS_Z + ac_ref_height * (ac_ref_height>0) if aaz = 0 then az = "0.000" else az = str(abs(aaz),6,3) if aaz < 0 then znak1 = "-" if aaz > 0 then znak1 = "+" if aaz = 0 then znak1 = ""
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, pos_y1, unID, pos_x1, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, pos_y1, unID, pos_x1, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_x1, pos_y1, unID, pos_x1, 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_x1, 0, unID, pos_y1, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_x1, -1, unID, pos_y1, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_x1, pos_y1, unID, pos_y1, 2: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 0, pos_y2, unID, pos_x2, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, pos_y2, unID, pos_x2, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_x2, pos_y2, unID, pos_x2, 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_x2, 0, unID, pos_y2, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_x2, -1, unID, pos_y2, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_x2, pos_y2, unID, pos_y2, 2: unID=unID+1 LINE2 pos_x1, pos_y1, pos_x2, pos_y2 HOTLINE2 pos_x1, pos_y1, pos_x2, pos_y2 pos_x = pos_x1 - pos_x2 pos_y = pos_y1 - pos_y2 !Поворот angl = 0 if pos_x > 0 and pos_y > 0 then angl = atn(pos_y/pos_x) endif if pos_x < 0 and pos_y > 0 then angl = 270 - atn(pos_x/pos_y) endif if pos_x < 0 and pos_y < 0 then angl = 90 - atn(pos_x/pos_y) endif if pos_x > 0 and pos_y < 0 then angl = 270 - atn(pos_x/pos_y) endif if pos_x = 0 and pos_y < 0 then angl = 90 endif if pos_x = 0 and pos_y > 0 then angl = 90 endif if pos_x < 0 and pos_y = 0 then angl = 0 endif if pos_x > 0 and pos_y = 0 then angl = 0 endif TEXTBLOCK "otm" 0, 2, angl, 1, 1, 1, znak1 + az TEXTBLOCK "type" 0, 8, angl, 1, 1, 1, tip_pol
HOTSPOT2 0, pos_ytxt, unID, pos_xtxt, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, pos_ytxt, unID, pos_xtxt, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xtxt, pos_ytxt, unID, pos_xtxt, 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xtxt, 0, unID, pos_ytxt, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xtxt, -1, unID, pos_ytxt, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_xtxt, pos_ytxt, unID, pos_ytxt, 2: unID=unID+1
RICHTEXT2 pos_xtxt, pos_ytxt, "otm" if show_type_pot then RICHTEXT2 pos_xtxt, pos_ytxt, "type" endif
endif
end
100: ! ============================================================================== ! Get GDL Polygon ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Input variables: ! ch: Channel ID ! polygonID: Polygon ID ! ! Returned variables: ! GDL stack: GDL polygon ! ==============================================================================
dim resVertices[] numVertices = CALLFUNCTION (ch, "GetVertices", polygonID, resVertices) numVertices = numVertices / 3
dim contArr[] numContours = CALLFUNCTION (ch, "GetContourEnds", polygonID, contArr)
for contIndex = 1 to numContours
if contIndex = 1 then begIdx = 0 else begIdx = contArr[contIndex] - 1 endif if contIndex = numContours then endIdx = numVertices - 1 else endIdx = contArr[contIndex + 1] - 2 endif
bClosed = 0 bStartWithLast = 0
index = endIdx * 3 lastVertX = resVertices[index + 1] lastVertY = resVertices[index + 2] lastVertA = resVertices[index + 3]
if abs(lastVertA) > EPS then put lastVertX, lastVertY, 1 bStartWithLast = 1 endif
for vertIndex = begIdx to endIdx index = vertIndex * 3 actVertX = resVertices[index + 1] actVertY = resVertices[index + 2] actVertA = resVertices[index + 3]
if vertIndex = begIdx then if bStartWithLast then ac2gdl_spx = lastVertX ac2gdl_spy = lastVertY else ac2gdl_spx = actVertX ac2gdl_spy = actVertY endif endif
if abs(lastVertA) > EPS then ac2gdl_mx = (actVertX + lastVertX) / 2 ac2gdl_my = (actVertY + lastVertY) / 2 ac2gdl_ratio = 1 / 2 / tan (lastVertA / 2)
ac2gdl_cx = ac2gdl_mx - ac2gdl_ratio * (actVertY - lastVertY) ! Arc center ac2gdl_cy = ac2gdl_my + ac2gdl_ratio * (actVertX - lastVertX)
put ac2gdl_cx, ac2gdl_cy, 900, 0, lastVertA, 4001 endif
if vertIndex > begIdx & abs(ac2gdl_spx - actVertX) < EPS & abs(ac2gdl_spy - actVertY) < EPS then put actVertX, actVertY, -1 bClosed = 1 else if vertIndex < endIdx | not(bStartWithLast) then put actVertX, actVertY, 1 endif endif
lastVertX = actVertX lastVertY = actVertY lastVertA = actVertA
next vertIndex
if not(bClosed) then ! Close the polygon if it has holes put ac2gdl_spx, ac2gdl_spy, -1 endif
next contIndex return
Symbol.Script_1D: !2014 !kuvbur@gmail.com ! !rot2 -SYMB_ROTANGLE !unID=1 !if mun_zone = 0 then ! REQUEST ("Zone_relations", "",category_name, code, name, number) ! if vartype(number) = 2 then parameters n_zon = number ! if vartype(name) = 2 then parameters name_zone = name !endif !model solid !EPS=0.000001 !unID=1 !dim y_t[] !dim extr_x[] !dim otr[][] !dim nul[][] !dim otr_otr[][] !dim otr_pl[][] !dim mass_pl[][] !dim area[] !dim centr_otv[][] !k_otr_pl=0 !k_otv=0 !n_otr=0 !dlin_arm_2=0 !ch_x=0 !ch_y=1 !i=1 !!!Удалим лишнее - новый способ !otr_otr=nul !otr_pl=nul !while ac_coords[i+1][1]<>0 do !if i>1000000 then end !Защита от бесконечного цикла ! if ac_coords[i][1]*1000-25.4>EPS and i>1 then ! k_otv=k_otv+1 !После первого 50,8 начинаются отверстия ! else ! !!Поворот ! kx1=ac_coords[i][2] ! ky1=ac_coords[i][3] ! kx2=ac_coords[i+1][2] ! ky2=ac_coords[i+1][3] ! ugol=SYMB_ROTANGLE ! GOSUB "koord_ang" ! !на выходе kxx1 kyy1 kxx2 kyy2 ! if k_otv=0 then !Для контура плиты ! k_otr_pl=k_otr_pl+1 ! otr_pl[k_otr_pl][1]=kxx1 ! otr_pl[k_otr_pl][2]=kyy1 ! otr_pl[k_otr_pl][3]=kxx2 ! otr_pl[k_otr_pl][4]=kyy2 ! max_x=max(kxx1,max_x) ! min_x=min(kxx1,min_x) ! max_y=max(kyy1,max_y) ! min_y=min(kyy1,min_y) ! endif ! if k_otv>0 then !Для отверстий ! if k_otv=1 then k_otr_otv[k_otv]=n_otr+1 ! if k_otv>1 then k_otr_otv[k_otv]=n_otr-k_otr_otv[k_otv-1]+1 ! n_otr=n_otr+1 ! otr_otv[n_otr][1]=kxx1 ! otr_otv[n_otr][2]=kyy1 ! otr_otv[n_otr][3]=kxx2 ! otr_otv[n_otr][4]=kyy2 ! endif ! endif !i=i+1 !ENDWHILE !PARAMETERS ch_pl_x=(max_x-min_x)/2 !PARAMETERS ch_pl_y=(max_y-min_y)/2 ! !perim = 0 !for i=1 to k_otr_pl ! l = SQR(((otr_pl[i][3]-otr_pl[i][1])**2)+((otr_pl[i][4]-otr_pl[i][2])**2)) ! perim = perim + l !next i !parameters perim = perim ! !!---------------Площадь плиты без отверстий !st_x=0 !st_y=0 !otr_pl[k_otr_pl+1][1]=0 !otr_pl[k_otr_pl+1][2]=0 !otr_pl[k_otr_pl+1][3]=0 !otr_pl[k_otr_pl+1][4]=0 !for i=2 to k_otr_pl ! if otr_pl[i][1] <> otr_pl[i+1][1] or otr_pl[i][2] <> otr_pl[i+1][2] then ! s_t = 0.5*((otr_pl[i+1][1]-otr_pl[i][1])*(otr_pl[i][2]-otr_pl[1][2])-(otr_pl[i][1]-otr_pl[1][1])*(otr_pl[i+1][2]-otr_pl[i][2])) ! s_plit_obsh = s_plit_obsh+abs(s_t) ! endif ! st_x=(otr_pl[i-1][1]+otr_pl[i][1])*(otr_pl[i-1][1]*otr_pl[i][2]-otr_pl[i][1]*otr_pl[i-1][2])+st_x ! st_y=(otr_pl[i-1][2]+otr_pl[i][2])*(otr_pl[i-1][1]*otr_pl[i][2]-otr_pl[i][1]*otr_pl[i-1][2])+st_y !next i !cpl_x=st_x/(6*s_plit_obsh) !cpl_y=st_y/(6*s_plit_obsh) !!hotspot2 cpl_x,cpl_y !!---------------Площадь отверстий !if k_otv>=1 then !area[k_otv] = 0 !for i = 1 to k_otv ! if i = 1 then n_perv = 1 ! if i>1 then n_perv=k_otr_otv[k_otv-1]+1 ! for j=1 to k_otr_otv[i] - 2 ! if otr_otv[n_perv+j][1] <> otr_otv[n_perv+j+1][1] or otr_otv[n_perv+j][2]<>otr_otv[n_perv+j+1][2] then ! s_t = 0.5*((otr_otv[n_perv+j+1][1]-otr_otv[n_perv+j][1])*(otr_otv[n_perv+j][2]-otr_otv[n_perv][2])-(otr_otv[n_perv+j][1]-otr_otv[n_perv][1])*(otr_otv[n_perv+j+1][2]-otr_otv[n_perv+j][2])) ! area[i] = area[i] + abs(s_t) ! area_obsh = round_int((area_obsh + abs(s_t)) * 1000) / 1000 ! endif ! next j !next i !endif !!---------------Чистая площадь !s_plit_ch = s_plit_obsh - area_obsh + s_vuch !parameters s_pol = s_plit_ch ! !endd = 1 !if endd=0 then !text2 0,0,"!!!!" !"koord_ang": !kxx1=kx1*cos(ugol)-ky1*sin(ugol) !kyy1=kx1*sin(ugol)+ky1*cos(ugol) !kxx2=kx2*cos(ugol)-ky2*sin(ugol) !kyy2=kx2*sin(ugol)+ky2*cos(ugol) !return !endif !
Symbol.Script_PR:
out_txt = " " razd = ";" sss = SURFACE3D()/2 - (h_pirog * perim) if tip_el = "Потолок" then txt1 = "Потолок " + tip_pol : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd else txt1 = tip_pol : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd endif txt1 = n_zon : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd txt1 = STR("%.2", s_pol+s_pol*s_zap) : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd txt1 = STR("%.0", n_sloi) : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd
txt1 = sl_1 : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd txt1 = sl_2 : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd txt1 = sl_3 : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd txt1 = sl_4 : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd txt1 = sl_5 : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd txt1 = sl_6 : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd txt1 = sl_7 : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd txt1 = sl_osn : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd
txt1 = STR("%.0mm", t_sloi_1) : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd txt1 = STR("%.0mm", t_sloi_2) : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd txt1 = STR("%.0mm", t_sloi_3) : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd txt1 = STR("%.0mm", t_sloi_4) : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd txt1 = STR("%.0mm", t_sloi_5) : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd txt1 = STR("%.0mm", t_sloi_6) : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd txt1 = STR("%.0mm", t_sloi_7) : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd txt1 = STR("%.0mm", t_sloi_osn) : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd txt1 = STR("%.0mm", perim+perim*s_zap) : out_txt = out_txt + txt1 + razd
COMPONENT out_txt, sss, "кв.м."
Symbol.Script_VL:
for i=1 to k_otr_pl put otr_pl[i][1] next i max_x = max(use(nsp)) min_x = min(get(nsp)) for i=1 to k_otr_pl put otr_pl[i][2] next i max_y = max(use(nsp)) min_y = min(get(nsp)) values "s_zap" range[0.05,0.15] if tip_el = "Потолок" then if sbros then pos_x1 = 0 pos_y1 = 0 pos_x2 = 0 pos_y2 = 0 pos_xtxt = 0 pos_ytxt = 0 PARAMETERS sbros = 0 endif if pos_x1 = 0 then PARAMETERS pos_x1 = min_x if pos_y1 = 0 then PARAMETERS pos_y1 = min_y if pos_x2 = 0 then PARAMETERS pos_x2 = max_x if pos_y2 = 0 then PARAMETERS pos_y2 = max_y if pos_xtxt = 0 then PARAMETERS pos_xtxt = (pos_x1+pos_x2)/2 if pos_ytxt = 0 then PARAMETERS pos_ytxt = (pos_y1+pos_y2)/2 else if sbros then PARAMETERS pos_x1 = min_x + (max_x - min_x) / 2 PARAMETERS pos_y1 = min_y + (max_y - min_y) / 2 PARAMETERS sbros = 0 endif if iz_id then PARAMETERS tip_pol = glob_id endif
!dim naen_pol_m[] !naen_pol_m[1] = " " !ch6=OPEN("TEXT","Типы_полов.txt","SEPARATOR=';',MODE=RO,DIALOG") !i = 1 : naen_pol = " " : flag = 0 !REPEAT ! n=INPUT(ch6, i, 1, naen_pol, n_sl, s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, s6, s7, t1, t2, t3, t4, t5, t6, t7, mat_f, kon) ! naen_pol_m[i] = naen_pol ! if naen_pol = tip_pol and naen_pol <> " " then ! parameters konstr_pol = tip_pol ! flag = i ! endif ! i = i + 1 !UNTIL n = -1 !close (ch6) !if konstr_pol <> tip_pol then flag = 0 !if flag = 0 then ! if vardim1(naen_pol_m)>1 then ! VALUES "konstr_pol" "Откл", naen_pol_m ! VALUES "del_type" "Откл", naen_pol_m ! else ! VALUES "konstr_pol" "Откл" ! VALUES "del_type" "Откл" ! endif !endif ! !if konstr_pol<>"Откл" then ! ch6=OPEN("TEXT", "Типы_полов.txt", "SEPARATOR=';', MODE=RO, DIALOG") ! i = 0 ! REPEAT ! i = i + 1 ! nr = INPUT (ch6, i, 1, konstr_pol_f, n_sl, s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, s6, s7, t1, t2, t3, t4, t5, t6, t7, mat_f, kon) ! UNTIL konstr_pol_f = konstr_pol or nr = -1 ! nr = INPUT (ch6, i, 1, konstr_pol_f, n_sl, s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, s6, s7, t1, t2, t3, t4, t5, t6, t7, mat_f, kon) ! parameters n_sloi=n_sl, sec_fill_1=s1, sec_fill_2=s2, sec_fill_3=s3, sec_fill_4=s4, sec_fill_5=s5, sec_fill_6=s6, sec_fill_7=s7 ! parameters t_sloi_1=t1/1000, t_sloi_2=t2/1000, t_sloi_3=t3/1000, t_sloi_4=t4/1000, t_sloi_5=t5/1000, t_sloi_6=t6/1000, t_sloi_7=t7/1000 ! parameters mat_1 = mat_f, kon_1=kon ! parameters odin_mat = 1, odin_kon = 1 ! close (ch6) ! parameters konstr_pol = "Откл" !endif ! !if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="zap_pol" and zap_pol and naen_pir <> " " then ! parameters konstr_pol = "Откл" ! ch6 = OPEN("DATA","Типы_полов.txt","SEPARATOR=';',MODE=WA,DIALOG") ! OUTPUT ch6, naen_pir, 1, n_sloi, sec_fill_1, sec_fill_2, sec_fill_3, sec_fill_4, sec_fill_5, sec_fill_6, sec_fill_7, t_sloi_1*1000, t_sloi_2*1000, t_sloi_3*1000, t_sloi_4*1000, t_sloi_5*1000, t_sloi_6*1000, t_sloi_7*1000, mat_1, kon_1 ! parameters zap_pol = 0 ! close (ch6) !endif ! !if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="del_type" and del_type <>"Откл" then ! ch6 = OPEN("DATA","Типы_полов.txt","SEPARATOR=';',MODE=WA,DIALOG") ! OUTPUT ch6, del_type, -1, n_sloi, sec_fill_1, sec_fill_2, sec_fill_3, sec_fill_4, sec_fill_5, sec_fill_6, sec_fill_7, t_sloi_1*1000, t_sloi_2*1000, t_sloi_3*1000, t_sloi_4*1000, t_sloi_5*1000, t_sloi_6*1000, t_sloi_7*1000, mat_1, kon_1 ! close (ch6) !endif ! !if del_b = 1 then ! ch6=OPEN("DATA","Типы_полов.txt","SEPARATOR=';',MODE=WO,DIALOG") ! close (ch6) ! parameters del_b = 0 !endif
if mun_zone = 0 then category_name = "" name = "" number = "" REQUEST ("Zone_relations", "",category_name, code, name, number) if number <> "" then parameters n_zon = number if name <> "" then parameters name_zone = name if category_name <> "" then parameters category_zone = category_name endif
VALUES "Shrift_fille" "Откл", CUSTOM VALUES "tip_el" "Пол", "Потолок" !++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ! Чтение текстовых стилей !++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ !if Shrift_fille <> "Откл" then ! file = Shrift_fille + "_font_info.txt" ! ch1 = OPEN ("TEXT", file, "SEPARATOR = ';', MODE = RO, LIBRARY") ! font_f = "" ! tip_f = 0 ! razmer_f = 0 ! nr = INPUT (ch1, 1, 1, font_f, tip_f, razmer_f, v) ! close ch1 ! PARAMETERS Shrift = font_f, Shrift_tip = tip_f, Shrift_razm = razmer_f !endif !++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ !values "A" 0,2 !if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="A" and A=2 then PARAMETERS pos_x = ch_pl_x,pos_y=ch_pl_y,A=0
values "gs_detlevel_2D" `Детальный`,`Простой` values "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.`
if odin_mat then PARAMETERS mat_2=mat_1,mat_3=mat_1,mat_4=mat_1,mat_5=mat_1,mat_6=mat_1,mat_7=mat_1 HIDEPARAMETER "mat_2","mat_3","mat_4","mat_5","mat_6","mat_7" endif if odin_kon then PARAMETERS kon_2=kon_1,kon_3=kon_1,kon_4=kon_1,kon_5=kon_1,kon_6=kon_1,kon_7=kon_1 HIDEPARAMETER "kon_2","kon_3","kon_4","kon_5","kon_6","kon_7" endif values "n_sloi" 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 if n_sloi=1 then HIDEPARAMETER "sec_fill_2","t_sloi_2","kon_2","mat_2","sec_fill_3","t_sloi_3","kon_3","mat_3", "sec_fill_4","t_sloi_4","kon_4","mat_4","sec_fill_5","t_sloi_5","kon_5","mat_5","sec_fill_6","t_sloi_6","kon_6","mat_6","sec_fill_7","t_sloi_7","kon_7","mat_7" if n_sloi=2 then HIDEPARAMETER "sec_fill_3","t_sloi_3","kon_3","mat_3","sec_fill_4","t_sloi_4","kon_4","mat_4","sec_fill_5","t_sloi_5","kon_5","mat_5","sec_fill_6","t_sloi_6","kon_6","mat_6","sec_fill_7","t_sloi_7","kon_7","mat_7" if n_sloi=3 then HIDEPARAMETER "sec_fill_4","t_sloi_4","kon_4","mat_4","sec_fill_5","t_sloi_5","kon_5","mat_5","sec_fill_6","t_sloi_6","kon_6","mat_6","sec_fill_7","t_sloi_7","kon_7","mat_7" if n_sloi=4 then HIDEPARAMETER "sec_fill_5","t_sloi_5","kon_5","mat_5","sec_fill_6","t_sloi_6","kon_6","mat_6","sec_fill_7","t_sloi_7","kon_7","mat_7" if n_sloi=5 then HIDEPARAMETER "sec_fill_6","t_sloi_6","kon_6","mat_6","sec_fill_7","t_sloi_7","kon_7","mat_7" if n_sloi=6 then HIDEPARAMETER "sec_fill_7","t_sloi_7","kon_7","mat_7" values "t_sloi_1" range(0,) if n_sloi > 1 then values "t_sloi_2" range(0,) if n_sloi > 2 then values "t_sloi_3" range(0,) if n_sloi > 3 then values "t_sloi_4" range(0,) if n_sloi > 4 then values "t_sloi_5" range(0,) if n_sloi > 5 then values "t_sloi_6" range(0,) if n_sloi > 6 then values "t_sloi_7" range(0,) values "t_sloi_osn" range(0,)
parameters k_otr_pl = k_otr_pl, otr_pl = otr_pl, k_otv = k_otv, k_otr_otv = k_otr_otv, otr_otv = otr_otv, area = area
dim var_kon[] var_kon[3]="Ядро" var_kon[1]="Отделка" var_kon[2]="Другая" values "kon_1" var_kon values "kon_2" var_kon values "kon_3" var_kon values "kon_4" var_kon values "kon_5" var_kon values "kon_6" var_kon values "kon_7" var_kon
!n_1=REQUEST ("Name_of_fill", sec_fill_1, sloi_1tmp)!Слой 1 !parameters sloi[1]=sloi_1tmp+" "+STR ("%.0mm", t_sloi_1)+"мм." !n_2=REQUEST ("Name_of_fill", sec_fill_2, sloi_2tmp)!Слой 2 !parameters sloi[2]=sloi_2tmp+" "+STR ("%.0mm", t_sloi_2)+"мм." !n_3=REQUEST ("Name_of_fill", sec_fill_3, sloi_3tmp)!Слой 3 !parameters sloi[3]=sloi_3tmp+" "+STR ("%.0mm", t_sloi_3)+"мм." !n_4=REQUEST ("Name_of_fill", sec_fill_4, sloi_4tmp)!Слой 4 !parameters sloi[4]=sloi_4tmp+" "+STR ("%.0mm", t_sloi_4)+"мм." !n_5=REQUEST ("Name_of_fill", sec_fill_5, sloi_5tmp)!Слой 5 !parameters sloi[5]=sloi_5tmp+" "+STR ("%.0mm", t_sloi_5)+"мм." !n_6=REQUEST ("Name_of_fill", sec_fill_6, sloi_6tmp)!Слой 6 !parameters sloi[6]=sloi_6tmp+" "+STR ("%.0mm", t_sloi_6)+"мм." !n_7=REQUEST ("Name_of_fill", vsec_fill_7, sloi_7tmp)!Слой 7 !parameters sloi[7]=sloi_7tmp+" "+STR ("%.0mm", t_sloi_7)+"мм." !n_osn=REQUEST ("Name_of_fill", sec_fill_osn, sloi_osntmp)!Основа !parameters sloi[8]=sloi_osntmp+" "+STR ("%.0mm", t_sloi_osn)+"мм."
dim sloi_t[][] dim pokaz_t[] dim mat_t[]
sloi_t[1][1]=sec_fill_1 sloi_t[1][2]=t_sloi_1*100 sloi_t[2][1]=sec_fill_2 sloi_t[2][2]=t_sloi_2*100 sloi_t[3][1]=sec_fill_3 sloi_t[3][2]=t_sloi_3*100 sloi_t[4][1]=sec_fill_4 sloi_t[4][2]=t_sloi_4*100 sloi_t[5][1]=sec_fill_5 sloi_t[5][2]=t_sloi_5*100 sloi_t[6][1]=sec_fill_6 sloi_t[6][2]=t_sloi_6*100 sloi_t[7][1]=sec_fill_7 sloi_t[7][2]=t_sloi_7*100 sloi_t[8][1]=sec_fill_osn sloi_t[8][2]=t_sloi_osn*100
pokaz_t[1]=kon_1 mat_t[1]=mat_1 pokaz_t[2]=kon_2 mat_t[2]=mat_2 pokaz_t[3]=kon_3 mat_t[3]=mat_3 pokaz_t[4]=kon_4 mat_t[4]=mat_4 pokaz_t[5]=kon_5 mat_t[5]=mat_5 pokaz_t[6]=kon_6 mat_t[6]=mat_6 pokaz_t[7]=kon_7 mat_t[7]=mat_7
parameters sloi_n = sloi_t parameters mat = mat_t parameters pokaz = pokaz_t
var = sec_fill_1 : gosub "len_txt" parameters sl_1 = str(sec_fill_1, len_str, 0)
var = sec_fill_2 : gosub "len_txt" parameters sl_2 = str(sec_fill_2, len_str, 0) if n_sloi < 2 then parameters sl_2 = "0" if n_sloi < 2 then parameters t_sloi_2 = 0, sec_fill_2 = 0
var = sec_fill_3 : gosub "len_txt" parameters sl_3 = str(sec_fill_3, len_str, 0) if n_sloi < 3 then parameters sl_3 = "0" if n_sloi < 3 then parameters t_sloi_3 = 0, sec_fill_3 = 0
var = sec_fill_4 : gosub "len_txt" parameters sl_4 = str(sec_fill_4, len_str, 0) if n_sloi < 4 then parameters sl_4 = "0" if n_sloi < 4 then parameters t_sloi_4 = 0, sec_fill_4 = 0
var = sec_fill_5 : gosub "len_txt" parameters sl_5 = str(sec_fill_5, len_str, 0) if n_sloi < 5 then parameters sl_5 = "0" if n_sloi < 5 then parameters t_sloi_5 = 0, sec_fill_5 = 0
var = sec_fill_6 : gosub "len_txt" parameters sl_6 = str(sec_fill_6, len_str, 0) if n_sloi < 6 then parameters sl_6 = "0" if n_sloi < 6 then parameters t_sloi_6 = 0, sec_fill_6 = 0
var = sec_fill_7 : gosub "len_txt" parameters sl_7 = str(sec_fill_7, len_str, 0) if n_sloi < 7 then parameters sl_7 = "0" if n_sloi < 7 then parameters t_sloi_7 = 0, sec_fill_7 = 0 var = sec_fill_osn : gosub "len_txt" parameters sl_osn = str(sec_fill_osn, len_str, 0) h_pirog=0 max_h=0 for i=1 to n_sloi h_pirog=h_pirog+sloi_n[i][2]/100 max_h=max(max_h,sloi_n[i][2]/100) next i max_h=max(max_h,sloi_n[8][2]/100) parameters h_pirog=h_pirog
parameters max_h=max_h
parameters control_sum = n_sloi+sec_fill_1+sec_fill_2+sec_fill_3+sec_fill_4+sec_fill_5+sec_fill_6+sec_fill_7+t_sloi_1*1000+t_sloi_2*1000+t_sloi_3*1000+t_sloi_4*1000+t_sloi_5*1000+t_sloi_6*1000+t_sloi_7*1000
end
"to_txt": if VARTYPE(var)=2 then PARAMETERS txt_fille[indd][mm]=var if VARTYPE(var)=1 then if abs(var)>=0 and abs(var)<=9 then len_str=1 if abs(var)>=10 and abs(var)<=99 then len_str=2 if abs(var)>=100 and abs(var)<=999 then len_str=3 if abs(var)>=1000 and abs(var)<=9999 then len_str=4 if abs(var)>=10000 and abs(var)<=99999 then len_str=5 PARAMETERS txt_fille[indd][mm]=str(var,len_str,0) endif return
"len_txt": if abs(var)>=0 and abs(var)<=9 then len_str=1 if abs(var)>=10 and abs(var)<=99 then len_str=2 if abs(var)>=100 and abs(var)<=999 then len_str=3 if abs(var)>=1000 and abs(var)<=9999 then len_str=4 if abs(var)>=10000 and abs(var)<=99999 then len_str=5 return
